name: XRReferenceSpace.getOffsetReferenceSpace
description: The XRReferenceSpace interface's getOffsetReferenceSpace() method returns a new reference space object which describes the relative difference in position between the object on which the method is called and a given point in 3D space.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'getOffsetReferenceSpace()' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
